title: Murder at the Filling Station : Motorcyclist stabbed by Three-wheeler driver
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 29-year-old motorcyclist was stabbed to death on Sunday (20) night following a heated dispute with the Three-wheeler driver at a filling station in Nittambuwa.
Sri Lanka Police said the deceased was a resident from Colombo 14.

According to Police, after the altercation at the filling station the three-wheeler driver had filled up his tank and left the area only to lie in wait for the motorcyclist to travel the same way, and thereafter attacked him with a sharp weapon.
